message: I propose dividing the $100 with a 75:25 split in favor of you, Bob. This might seem like a generous offer considering the value erosion in subsequent rounds.
I propose a 60:40 split in my favor. This is a fair compromise, considering the value erosion in subsequent rounds will be significantly greater for you than for me.

Considering the inflation rates and the diminishing value of money in future rounds, I propose an equal split of $100, both for us. This ensures a fair division while accounting for the economic conditions.
